author: abez_sharon
title: A nice set if on sale!
review:
This plane reminds me of the Seaduck from the TaleSpin series, an excellent disney cartoon.

Pros

  • Got it on sale! so was at a nice price point (I think this set was on sale at Shop@Home for the longest time)
  • It's got a rear entry platform.
  • Withstands play abuse well. Wings and wheels stick on tight.

Cons

  • Wheels are too tight for the kids to push in to the slot.

At the 50% off price, this was a set which has endless playability since you can re-enact the TaleSpin series which is now double the fun.
